summary.span: 使用指定的專案根項目及全域專案集合全域屬性和預設工具版本，建構空的專案並加以評估。

span.span: Constructs an empty project and evaluates it using the given project root and the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案或指定的專案根提供給來源專案檔的完整路徑時，此專案會加入全域專案集合。This project is added to the global project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 如果評估失敗，則會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已經有相同的對等的專案，則會擲回 InvalidOperationException 載入專案集合中。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 稍後再加入任何中繼資料。Any metadata can be added later. 如果萬用字元運算式已包含新的項目，則不會修改專案的來源。Does not modify the project source if a wildcard expression already includes the new item. 評估會以最佳方式為基礎的進行。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 新的項目後面的專案來源中定義的項目可能會用於評估。Items that are defined in the project source following the new item may be used for evaluation. 會評估此項目。Only this item is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他項目。Other items that might depend on it are not affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將項目附加至第一個項目群組，並沒有條件，並沒有子系或其第一個子系是相同類型的項目。Appends the item to the first item group that does not have a condition and has either no children or whose first child is an item of the same type. 評估以最佳方式為基礎:-展開所有項目。Evaluates on a best-effort basis: -expands with all items. 在新的項目底下的 XML 中定義的項目可能會使用，即使實際評估其不會。Items that are defined in the XML below the new item may be used, even though in a real evaluation they would not be. 會評估此項目。Only this item is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他項目。Other items that might depend on it are not affected. 這可讓您輕鬆了解並不一定會保留本身完全一致的狀態中的專案之前重新評估。This is a convenience that it is understood does not necessarily leave the project in a perfectly self consistent state until reevaluation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllEvaluatedItemDefinitionMetadata As ICollection(Of ProjectMetadata)

summary.span: 取得在評估期間遇到的所有項目定義中繼資料。

span.span: Gets all item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 所有項目定義中繼資料在評估期間遇到。

span.span: All item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 這不包含其條件未評估為 true 的任何項目 (Element)，也不包含在上次評估以後加入的任何項目 (Item) 定義中繼資料。

span.span: This does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor any item definition metadata added since the last evaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目中繼資料會在第二個評估行程中讀取。Item metadata is read during the second evaluation pass. 不同於 ItemDefinitions 屬性所傳回的中繼資料，此中繼資料經過排序，並包含任何後續覆寫具有相同名稱和項目類型的中繼資料。Unlike metadata returned by the ItemDefinitions property, this metadata is ordered, and includes any metadata subsequently overridden with the same name and item type.

summary.span: 取得在評估期間遇到之所有項目的列舉程式。

span.span: Gets an enumerator over all items encountered during evaluation.

summary.span: 這些項目會在第三回評估期間進行讀取。

span.span: These are read during the third evaluation pass.

value.span: 在評估期間遇到的所有項目的列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator over all items encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 這些項目會在第三回評估期間進行讀取。

span.span: These are read during the third evaluation pass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於這些項目屬性所傳回的項目，這些排序相同的項目類型的項目不只被排序的評估期間遇到的其他所有項目。Unlike those items returned by the Items property, these are ordered with respect to all other items encountered during evaluation, not just ordered with respect to items of the same item type. 在某些應用程式，這個完成的相互順序很重要，與這類主機可以使用這個屬性。In some applications, this complete mutual ordering is significant, and such hosts can use this property. 列舉型別不包含任何項目，其條件未評估為 true，也不會包含上次評估以後加入的任何項目。The enumeration does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor does it include any items added since the last evaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第一個評估階段期間，會讀取這些內容。These properties are read during the first evaluation pass. 像 [屬性] 屬性所傳回的屬性，這些會經過排序，且包含任何後續覆寫具有相同名稱的屬性。Unlike properties returned by the Properties property, these are ordered, and includes any properties subsequently overridden with the same name.

span.span: Gets a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 用來評估屬性、 屬性群組、 匯入上找到之條件的屬性可能的屬性值的集合和時間的。

span.span: A collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 此集合為標準格式。

span.span: The collection is in canonical form.

value.span: 輸入項目的名稱就是要評估之屬性的名稱，而其值則是可能屬性值的清單。

span.span: The name of the entry is the name of the property to be evaluated, and the value is a list of possible property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果下列條件存在專案中的屬性：Condition|$（平台） '= =' 偵錯|x 86'"condition ' = = 'Release' 」 資料表中會填入 {"Configuration"，{"Debug"，"Release"}} {"Platform"，{"x86"}} 視覺效果會使用此集合Studio 來判斷專案中定義的設定For example, if the following conditions existed on properties in a project: Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Debug|x86'" Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Release'" the table would be populated with { "Configuration", { "Debug", "Release" }} { "Platform", { "x86" }} This collection is used by Visual Studio to determine the configurations defined in the project

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MarkDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個專案標記為已修改。

span.span: Marks this project as modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它很少需要明確地呼叫這個方法，因為所有的編輯作業會影響專案時，會自動將它標示為已修改。It is seldom necessary to call this method explicitly, because all edits affecting a project automatically mark it as modified. 有時候，不過，這個方法必須呼叫。Sometimes, however, this method must be called. 例如，專案可能有其條件取決於存在磁碟的檔案匯入項目。For example, a project may have an Import element whose condition depends on a file that exists on a disk. 如果不存在該檔案，這是在評估階段，並建立評估之後，則專案必須明確標示為已修改。If that file does not exist at evaluation time, and it is created after evaluation, then the project must be explicitly marked as modified. 方法會使用這個屬性來判斷是否需要評估。The method uses this property to determine if an evaluation is necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目群組中包含的項目變成空的它也會移除。If the item group containing the item becomes empty, it is also removed. 如果項目是來自萬用字元或以分號分隔的運算式，運算式會先展開成多個項目。If the item originates from a wildcard or semicolon-separated expression, the expression is first expanded into multiple items. 更新專案時，但沒有進一步評估直到重新評估。The project is updated, but no further evaluation occurs until reevaluation. 比方說，如果項目就會移除類型"i"，"j"評估從"@(i) 」 則不會修改之前重新評估。For example, if an item of type "i" is removed, "j" which is evaluated from "@(i)" is not modified until reevaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有具有指定名稱的屬性，更新最後一個現有的屬性具有指定名稱本身或其屬性群組時，在沒有條件，除非它在匯入的檔案產生。If there is no property with the given name, updates the last existing property with the given name that has no condition on itself or its property group, unless it originated in an imported file. 否則，第一個屬性群組中沒有條件，最後一個現有屬性群組之後，其他專案的開頭建立屬性群組，如有必要將新屬性。Otherwise, adds a new property in the first property group without a condition, creating a property group if necessary after the last existing property group, else at the start of the project. 評估會以最佳方式為基礎的進行。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 下列新的屬性與專案來源中定義的屬性可能會用於評估。Properties that are defined in the project source following the new property may be used for evaluation. 會評估這個屬性。Only this property is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他屬性。Other properties that might depend on it are not affected.
